description: Unique identifier for the audit report.
notes: Has the form YYYY-MM-(CENSUS|GSAFAC)-##########. For CENSUS records, the ### is the historic DBKEY.

description: Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
Name of auditee certifying official
Title of auditee certifying official
Name of auditee's primary contact
Email address of the auditee's primary contact
Full name of the auditee organization
Phone number of the auditee
notes: All phone numbers match the the [FAC phone number schema](https://github.com/GSA-TTS/FAC/blob/ce7cbfed1b4ce48635f54b8155b49fbd1c0efa49/backend/schemas/source/base/Base.libsonnet#L244)

description: Job title of the auditee's primary contact
Street address of the auditee
City where the auditee is based
State where the auditee is based
notes: All sets in the [FAC list of states](https://github.com/GSA-TTS/FAC/blob/ce7cbfed1b4ce48635f54b8155b49fbd1c0efa49/backend/schemas/source/base/States.json)

description: Employer Identification Number (EIN) of the auditee
Auditee's zip code
notes: All zip codes match the regular expression `^[0-9]{5}(?:[0-9]{4})?$`

description: Title of auditor certifying official
Name of auditor's certifying official
Phone number of the auditor
State where the auditor is based
City where the auditor is based
Job title of the auditor
Street address of the auditor
Auditor's zip code
Country where the auditor is based
Name of the auditor
Email address of the auditor
Name of the auditing firm
Address of the auditor (if international)
Employer Identification Number (EIN) of the auditing firm
Two digit federal agency prefix of the cognizant agency
notes: Presented as text, because some numbers begin with 0

description: Two digit federal agency prefix of the oversight agency
notes: Presented as text, because some numbers begin with 0

description: The first date an audit component or Form SF-SAC was received by the Federal audit Clearinghouse
Date when the report was marked as ready for certification
Date when the auditor certified the report
Date when the auditee certified the report
Date when the auditee submitted the report to the FAC
Date when the FAC accpeted an audit
End date of the fiscal year covered by the audit
Start date of the fiscal year covered by the audit
Type of audit conducted
General Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) - Type of report issued on the financial statements
notes: Comma-separated string, where the list may include any of `not_gaap`, `unmodified_opinion`, `qualified_opinion`, `adverse_opinion`, or `disclaimer_of_opinion`. The field may also have the value `GSA_MIGRATION`

description: Special purpose framework that was used as the basis of accounting
Indicates whether a special purpose framework was required
The auditor's opinion on the special purpose framework
notes: Comma-separated string, where the list may include any of `not_gaap`, `unmodified_opinion`, `qualified_opinion`, `adverse_opinion`, or `disclaimer_of_opinion`. The field may also have the value `GSA_MIGRATION`

description: Indicates if auditor included a "going concern" disclosure
Indicates if auditor disclosed internal control deficiencies
Indicates if auditor disclosed material weaknesses in internal controls
Indicates if auditor disclosed material noncompliance
Dollar threshold to distinguish between type A and type B programs
Indicates if the auditee qualifies as low risk
Indicates whether or not the report includes a Summary Schedule of Prior Year Audit Findings
notes: A string containing a comma-separated list of agency numbers

description: Self-reported type of entity
Number of months covered in the audit period
Audit period covered by audit
Total amount of federal funds expended by the auditee
Code indicating the type of audit conducted
notes: All audits captured by GSA are type_audit_code "UG"

description: Indicates if the audit report is publicly available
Source of the audit data; CENSUS if the data was collected by Census, and GSAFAC if collected by GSA.
Indicates if the audit follows AICPA guidance
Indicates if the audit coveres multiple UEIs
Indicates if the audit covers multiple EINs
Indicates if secondary auditors were involved
Identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year the audit was conducted
The award reference number as listed in SF-SAC Section 1: Federal Awards. Award references will be formatted “AWARD-####”.
notes: FAC system generated sequence number used to link to Findings data between CFDA/ALN Info and Findings

description: Two-digit prefix identifying the agency
Three-digit prefix identifying the federal awarding agency (the last 3 digits of their Assistance Listing Number, formerly known as the CFDA)
notes: The extensions are generally three-digit numbers. Agencies sometimes apply a letter to the end of this extension to designate programs: `123A`, for example. For research and development, the value may be `RD` or `RD#`. In the case of an unknown program, `U##` is possible. `GSA_MIGRATION` is sometimes found for historic records where the ALN could not be decomposed into anything meaningful.

description: Other data used to identify the award which is not a CFDA/ALN number
notes: A free-form field used by auditees and auditors to further identify an award or passthrough information.

description: Name of the federal program that provided the funding
Total amount of federal funds expended for an award
notes: Rounded to the nearest whole dollar

description: Name of the cluster to which this federal award belongs
notes: Controlled field; `GSA_MIGRATION` or see the [FAC list of cluster names](https://github.com/GSA-TTS/FAC/blob/ce7cbfed1b4ce48635f54b8155b49fbd1c0efa49/backend/schemas/source/data/cluster-names.csv)

description: The name of the cluster (if not listed in the compliance supplement)
State-designated cluster name if applicable
Total federal awards expended for each cluster in the audit
notes: Auto-completed based on previous field responses

description: Total amount of federal funding for the specific program
notes: Auto-completed based on previous field responses

description: Indicates if the award is classified as a major program
notes: If the Federal program is a major program, "Y" wil appear, then either letter "U, Q, A, or D" will appear for the type of audit report on the major program: U=Unqualifed, Q=Qualified, A=Adverse, D=Disclaimer. This field will be blank or "N" if not a major program.

description: Indicates if the award is a loan
Outstanding loan balance if applicable
Indicates if the funding was received directly from a federal agency
Type of report issued on the major program compliance. U=Unqualifed, Q=Qualified, A=Adverse, D=Disclaimer.
Number of findings for the federal program
notes: Only available for audit years 2013 and beyond

description: Indicates if the award was passed through another entity before reaching the auditee
Amount of federal funding passed through to subrecipient
Identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
The award reference number as listed in SF-SAC Section 1: Federal Awards. Award references will be formatted “AWARD-####”.
notes: Has the shape AWARD-#### or AWARD-#####

description: Findings reference numbers
Indicates if the finding is classified as a material weakness
Indicates if the finding resulted in a modified audit opinion
Indicates if the finding falls under "other findings"
Indicates if the finding involves "other matters"
Audit finding reference numbers from the immediate prior audit
Indicates if the finding includes questioned costs
notes: `GSA_MIGRATION` or a comma-separated list of reference numbers (e.g. `2022-001,2021-003`). Spaces may be present in the list.

description: Indicates if the finding was reported in a prior year
Indicates if the finding is classified as a significant deficiency

Code indicating the type of compliance requirement affected by the finding. 


A. Activities allowed or unallowed
B. Allowable costs/cost principles
C. Cash management
D. Reserved
E. Eligibility
F. Equipment and real property management
G. Matching, level of effort, earmarking
H. Period of performance (or availability) of Federal funds
I. Procurement and suspension and debarment
J. Program income
K. Reserved
L. Reporting
M. Subrecipient monitoring
N. Special tests and provisions
P. Other

Note: There is no "O" option.
notes: This field is either `GSA_MIGRATION` or a string of characters in the set [A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J,K,L,M,N,P].

description: Identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
Reference number assigned to the specific finding
Indicates if the finding text contains a chart or table
Full textual description of the finding, detailing the issue identified during the audit.
Identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
Reference number assigned to the specific finding
Indicates if the corrective action plan contains a chart or table
Content of the Corrective Action Plan (CAP)
Identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
The award reference number as listed in SF-SAC Section 1: Federal Awards. Award references will be formatted “AWARD-####”.
notes: Has the shape AWARD-#### or AWARD-#####

description: Identifying number assigned by the pass-through entity
Name of passthrough entity
Unique identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
Title of the note related to the Schedule of Expenditures of Federal Awards (SEFA)
Description of the accounting policies applied to the SEFA
Indicates whether the 10% de minimis indirect cost rate is used
Explanation of the indirect cost rate used, if applicable
Content of the note
Indicates whether the note contains a chart or table
Identifier for the audit report
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee
Year in which the audit was conducted
Employer Identification Number (EIN) of the secondary auditor
Name of the auditor
Name of the contact person
Title of the contact person
Email address of the contact person
Phone number of the contact person
Street address of the contact person
City where the contact person is located
State where the contact is located
ZIP code of the contact person
Identifier for the audit report.
Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) of the auditee.
Year in which the audit was conducted.
Additional Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) associated with the auditee.

Year in which the audit was conducted
